categories: Category:Events during the New Republic Era

nodes.text: Around 9 ABY, an attack on an Imperial base was led by Magistrate Greef Karga. He and his companions Din Djarin, Carasynthia Dune, and a Mythrol infiltrated the installation and destroyed it, stealing a Trexler 906 Armored Marauder to escape in. The confrontation effectively ended the Imperial presence on Nevarro.
The mission appeared in "Chapter 12: The Siege" of Jon Favreau's 2019 Disney+ television series The Mandalorian, directed by Carl Weathers and released on November 20, 2020.
